Please add the following secrets to your GitHub repository settings under Settings > Secrets and variables > Actions > New repository secret:
- GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_JSON
- GCP_PROJECT_ID
- GCP_REGION
- DATADOG_API_KEY
- DATADOG_APP_KEY
- GITHUB_TOKEN
- GITHUB_REPO_OWNER
- GITHUB_REPO_NAME
- GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID
- GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET
- GOOGLE_REDIRECT_URI
- GOOGLE_REFRESH_TOKEN
- GOOGLE_CALENDAR_ID
- SLACK_BOT_TOKEN
- SLACK_CHANNEL_ID
- DOMAIN_NAME
- RABBITMQ_URL
- ZENDESK_SUBDOMAIN
- ZENDESK_EMAIL
- ZENDESK_API_TOKEN
